products.title: Vitra Blackout Beige Roller Blind
products.metadescription: Vitra Blackout Beige Roller Blind in Cream. Made to measure from £8.77 with FREE UK mainland delivery. This Roller Blind includes 5-year guarantee and child safety features.
products.productdescription:
Make a smart update with the neat and functional design of the Vitra Blackout Roller blind. The neutral beige fabric is perfect for blending with a range of home styles. Mix with a minimalist monochrome scheme or team with mocha and cream tones for a warmer look. Either way, this versatile blind is bright and uplifting for your space and boasts blackout functionality too.
 
 Product ID: SDB-RBX0527 Fabric Colour: Beige Material: 100% Polyester Lining: Colour Match Backing - See Sample Headrail: Durable Aluminium Roller Tube Supported By White Steel Brackets - Top, Face or Side Fix     Control Type: Smooth Continuous-Looped Chain Energy Saving Rating: ER3 - Highest Energy Saving Value - UV Protection and Effective Thermal Retention Blackout: Yes

products.title: Vitra Beige (Blackout)
products.metadescription: Buy made to measure Vitra Beige (Blackout) Blackout Roller Blinds from SoEasy Blinds. Order quality Blackout Roller Blinds online today at low prices with fast UK delivery
products.productdescription:
Min Width: 200mm Max Width: 3048mm
 	Min Drop: 200mm Max Drop: 2913mm
 	Fabric Joins: Blinds with a width and drop greater than 1730mm may be joined. Dependant on the fabric patterns will be matched.
 	Fabric Composition: Polyester
 	Tube: Robust Aluminium Tube
 	Control: Sidewinder or Spring Control
 	Guarantee: 12 Months
